name: Helix's Habitica Dark V2
description:
This is a theme for Habitica that changes the UI to something more comfortable to the eye, especially at night. Tested on Chrome, should work on Firefox and Edge.

This theme has been rewritten from ground up and is not themed inline with it's version 1 release. This is a personal project and is still in the early stages of development.
additional_info:
Version: 2a.1
Date: 2020-10-21 

Changes
- Initial Release
- Just Themed Tasks and Party Page

Bugs
- Many Items Not Themed
